name: 戦高校時代
description:
20XX年新宿に位置する高校。
今にも、忘れがたい事件が起こる…
教室で緊張があふれている。
お前が然る者になるか？

ControlsGamepadKeyboardAttack
Strong Attack (HOLD)
Square buttonspaceBlockCircle buttonbDashX buttonv

Description

Fend off your attackers and defeat the Boss.

Use Strong Attack to stagger blocking enemies, leaving them open for a combo.

Cooperate with a friend to increase your chance of survival.

Vandalise property and make difficult moral decisions.

You can skip a stage with the 'end' key but you're cheating if you do this.
